name: Run & Die
description:
This is my submission for the GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022. Its absolute GARBAGE but im beginning in game dev. Also its made in Python with Pygame. 

The game is simple : you need to die before the timer is up. I made only 3 levels because because I didn't have enough time to do more. The controls are explained in the tutorial but here are them :

- A and D to move

- Space to jump

- LMaj to dash

- Escape to quit the game

I didn't fix much bugs, so you may be finding some while playing, sorry :(

Anyways, feedbacks are welcome
